thread.title: Wonderful GSA
thread.title_full: Wonderful GSA - Review of Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mldgarey
title: Wonderful GSA
text: first impressions count and Freddy at the check in desk made a great one. Professional, warm, welcoming, efficient all describe Freddy. With so many choices of hotels in NYC things like a great check in expierence makes a difference and I will stay here again and will also recommend it to friends and family.
